Home Highlights

home highlight gentrification

Tweet
  • Content
  • Feedback
Minneapolis warehouse district (Wikimedia)

Gentrification is a divisive subject in cities across the United States. We review major studies on its drawbacks and benefits.


Writer: Journalist's Resource | March 18, 2015

Journalist's Resource

A project of the Harvard Kennedy School's Shorenstein Center and the Carnegie-Knight Initiative, we're an open-access site that curates scholarly studies and reports.
